Detailed Description

class to decode a particular file (one per file). Saves info such as filename and length (after the header is read.)

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual void ODFileDecoder::Decode ( samplePtr &  data,
sampleFormat &  format,
sampleCount  start,
sampleCount  len,
unsigned int  channel 
) [pure virtual]

Decodes the samples for this blockfile from the real file into a float buffer. This is file specific, so subclasses must implement this only. the buffer should be created by the ODFileDecoder implementing this method. It should set the format parameter so that the client code can deal with it. This class should call ReadHeader() first, so it knows the length, and can prepare the file object if it needs to.

Implemented in ODFlacDecoder.

Referenced by ODDecodeBlockFile::WriteODDecodeBlockFile().
